definition: (theater) blackout (e.g. at the end of a scene)/(literary) to be promoted in rank secretly
to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)

sentences.english: These gate valves are ideal for closing and opening the flow in water pipelines.
sentences.chinese: 本閘閥暗轉在介質爲水的管路上，作爲啓閉設備使用。
